page.title: 11MYRECAIRNIE FARM-HISTORY
page.content: This farm of 300 acres is owned and run by the Smith family. It was originally part of the large Kilmarron Estate, and the Smiths first rented their land in 1939. However, the estate was broken up in 1959 and the Smiths were the first tenants to buy their farm. It is now run by Mr.Smith and his father,but Mrs.Smith does all the paper-work and this takes up much of her time. They have one son, at present at Castlehill Primary School, Cupar and he shows a keen interest in his father's farm. The farm has 4 tied cottages, 3 of which are rented out and one is given free to a lady who works in the farmhouse. Only 2 farm workers are employed at Myrecairnie (compared to 8 in the mid 1940's).
